name: Affogato
description: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso combined with steam milk & a smooth topping of foam

name: Cafe Latte
description: Espresso combined with steamed milk & topped with a small amount of small veivety milk foam.

name: Cafe Mocha
description: Espresso, white chocolate , steamed milk topped with foam.

name: Amaretto Bean Latte
description: Espresso, amaretto & vanilla bean syrup steamed milk topped with whipped cream and drizzled with caramel sauce.

name: Cinnamon Bun Latte
description: Espresso, French vanilla & Caramel syrup steamed milk, topped with whipped cream, drizzled with caramels sauce.

name: White Chocolate Caramella
description: Espresso, caramel & white chocolate sauce, steamed milk, topped with whipped cream & shaved white chocolate.
